main.name: KuanPo Lin

resume.skillmessage: Smart, Nice and Get things done. Growth, not comfort.

education.degree: Master of Science in Civil Engineering

work.title: Associate Instructor
work.description: Teaching two senior-level courses for two summers, with average 40 students enrolled. Received 95/100 recommendation. Saved the course under urgent situation due to original instructor failed to perform proper remote teaching and suddenly quit.

work.title: Teaching Assistant
work.description: Most beloved and experienced TA in the department. Teaching 21 courses in 17 quarters. Designed and suggested the procedure of remote teaching under Covid periods.

work.title: Research Assistant
work.description: Developed the Scientific Computational Physical Program to simulate the clustering of integrins. Presented an Analytical Mechanical Model to compute the force that cell exerted on the substrates.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
